- Rollup Version: 1.10
- Operating System (or Browser): arch, firefox
- Node Version: 11.14

### How Do We Reproduce?

<!--
  Issues without minimal reproductions will be closed! Please provide one by:
  1. Using the REPL at https://rollupjs.org/repl, or
  2. Work to isolate the problem and provide the exact steps in this issue, or
  3. Provide a minimal repository link (Read https://git.io/fNzHA for instructions).
     These may take more time to triage than the other options.
-->

```ts
// a:
export * from "./b";
// b:
export * from "./a";
```

[REPL Link](https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=1.10.0&) with complete example.

Found this while working on https://github.com/Swatinem/rollup-plugin-dts/issues/13#issuecomment-484656703 but as the REPL example shows, this also fails without any plugins.

The adapted testcase is from here:
https://github.com/Microsoft/web-build-tools/tree/master/build-tests/api-extractor-scenarios/src/circularImport2

### Expected Behavior

It should correctly bundle all the code :-)

### Actual Behavior

The REPL fails with `InternalError: too much recursion`

Locally I get an infinite recursion error.
